synopsis.text: Hiroomi's mission, three years before the events of the TV series, sets the stage for the Nase siblings' first encounter with the enigmatic Akihito. Tasked with subduing the half-human, half-youmu, Hiroomi finds his curious little sister Mitsuki tagging along for the ride. As they embark on their mission, they discover that they are not the only ones in pursuit of Akihito, marking the beginning of the Kyoukai no Kanata story. This prequel episode, titled "Beyond the Boundary: Daybreak," offers a glimpse into the past and the events that led to the Nase siblings' fateful meeting with Akihito.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
